title: Setup github actions workflow
description:
Setup GitHub Actions workflow for container builds and publishing.

## Acceptance Criteria

- .github/workflows/container.yml
- Triggers on container-v* tags and manual dispatch
- Multi-arch support (QEMU+Buildx)
- ghcr.io authentication
- Builds all variants (base, deno, rust, rails)
- Version+latest tags
- Pushes to ghcr.io/schpet/cracked:*
- Includes caching

title: Create casual readme
description:
## Acceptance Criteria

- Create readme.md (lowercase filename)
- Use casual tone throughout
- Describes project as "github repo with dockerfiles for dev"
- Mentions dotfiles via stow
- Include disclaimer: "useful for me, published for reference"
- Keep it minimal but informative

description:
